channel.title: Chicken or Beef?
channel.description: If I were clever like Eric Sink or Bill Caputo, I'd be able to turn that catchy title in to a witty and insightful post about the software industry. But sadly for you, I'm not and (as witnessed in this...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Adrian Lester+00:00
item.description: You didn't exactly travel light in your previous job either. What was it - 3 laptops and a PDA? No wonder they'd to charter a flight just for your bags :)
item.dc:creator: Adrian Lester

item.title: Comment by Ben+00:00
item.description: Is there not a vegan option? b(^_^)

item.title: Comment by JiggaDigga+00:00
item.description: Great reading, keep up the great posts. Peace, JiggaDigga
